text: == Events == * December 15 â€“ Sergius succeeds Conon as Pope * King Theuderic III of Neustria is defeated by Pepin of Herstal, Mayor of the Palace of Austrasia. Austrasia and Neustria are combined again; Pepin becomes de facto ruler of both areas. * Egica succeeds Erwig as king of the Visigoths. * Construction of the Dome of the Rock is started. * Adamnan visits the Northumbrian court of Ecgfrith to ransom Irish captives.
